original_title: Sri Lanka announces squad for 1st test against Ireland in Galle
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Dimuth Karunaratne will captain the Sri Lanka team against Irealand in the 1st test at the Galle International Cricket Station.
SLC on Wednesday (12) announced a 15-man squad for the 1st test that will be played from 16th to 20th April 2023.
Sri Lanka requires an expeditious debt resolution – IMF Deputy Chief
Sri Lanka will engage with creditors on the principles of comparable treatment – President
Sri Lanka Met Department issues heat warning for Thursday and Friday
